sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include">
    <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <access>package_private</access>
        <active>true</active>
        <api_name>global.getRecordProducerParent</api_name>
        <caller_access/>
        <client_callable>false</client_callable>
        <description>Gets the Record Producer Parent of the variable</description>
        <name>getRecordProducerParent</name>
        <script><![CDATA[function getRecordProducerParent() {
	if (typeof parent === 'undefined' || parent == null) {
		if (current) {
			var parentGr = current.cat_item.getRefRecord();
			if (parentGr && parentGr.instanceOf('sc_cat_item_producer'))
				return parentGr.table_name;
			var vsGR = current.variable_set.getRefRecord();
			if (vsGR && vsGR.instanceOf('item_option_new_producer_set'))
				return vsGR.table_name;
		}
		return "";
	} else
		return parent.table_name;
}]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>maint</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2014-02-06 00:47:24</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>5be1fdd047f211008427d8966c9a71e8</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>9</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>getRecordProducerParent</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="Service Catalog Platform" source="com.glideapp.servicecatalog.platform">6d218d0f6d2620100acb70b35343303c</sys_package>
        <sys_policy/>
        <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_include_5be1fdd047f211008427d8966c9a71e8</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2020-07-09 17:57:21</sys_updated_on>
        <u_script_length>454</u_script_length>
    </sys_script_include>
</record_update>
